Key Match Events: Hunter Goodman hit two home runs, including a tiebreaking grand slam in the eighth inning and the Colorado Rockies came back to beat the Chicago Cubs 9-5
Jacob Stallings’ RBI double in the ninth inning helped the Colorado Rockies beat the Detroit Tigers 4-2
Pre-Game Insights: The Rockies look to sweep a three-game series with a victory over the Arizona Diamondbacks
The St. Louis Cardinals seek to build upon a three-game win streak with a victory against the Colorado Rockies
Miscellaneous Highlights: Brenton Doyle scored the winning run on a ninth-inning throwing error, and Colorado dealt a blow to the Arizona Diamondbacks’ playoff chances with a 3-2 win in a game that marked the return of Senzatela from Tommy John surgery

Over the final two weeks of the season, the Rockies will play nine of their 12 games at hitter-friendly Coors Field, making Rodgers a more appealing fantasy option than usual if he's able to shake off the hamstring injury
Others: Brendan Rodgers has been dealing with hamstring tightness, Patrick Lyons of JustBaseball.com reports
Brendan Rodgers is out of the lineup for Sunday's game against the Cubs due to hamstring tightness
